outline:
1. to see, perceive, look, behold, prophesy, provide
    1. (Qal)
      1. to see, behold
      2. to see as a seer in the ecstatic state
      3. to see, perceive
        1. with the intelligence
        2. to see (by experience)
        3. to provide
strongs_def: to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
